Bosse_Gorai The Uncaged_Status_Drunk Wit: Feeling empowered due to the influence of potent spirits.
Bosse_Gorai The Uncaged_Status_Minimum_D: Shrunk to a fraction of your normal size. Movement speed and damage dealt is reduced while damage taken is increased.
Bosse_Gorai The Uncaged_Status_Rodential: Fated to transform into a pterosquirrel when this effect expires. Effect canceled upon being hit by a certain action.
Bosse_Shishio_Status_Hysteria_Desc: Unable to act on your own free will.
Bosse_Unknown Source_Status_Jog_Desc: Movement speed is increased. Effect ends upon entering battle.
Bosse_Unknown Source_Status_Seasons Of T: Able to execute ninjutsu in succession.
Bosse_Unknown Source_Status_Six Fulms Un: You are slowly slipping down, your movement speed dropping as you descend deeper. Burial will result in KO.
ContentDesc_Der Rokkon: On Hingashi's westernmost isle of Shishu lies the long-venerated Mount Rokkon. Once refuge for humble monks and weary pilgrims, the holy site lately fell to a host of malevolent mononoke, spurring the local liege lord to take the unprecedented step of inviting ijin to assist in reclaiming its slopes. As is his wont, Hancock has secured the promise of valuable rewards in exchange for his─and your─assistance, but each of these treasures has a life of its own...
Instancecontenttextdata_36307_Text: You thought to go down this path as well? How reassuring!
Instancecontenttextdata_36308_Text: Interested in a different path? I shall place my trust in your intuition.
Instancecontenttextdata_36309_Text: A grand gate. What lies beyond, I wonder?
Instancecontenttextdata_36310_Text: I espy a most promising pagoda! Let us make it our destination.
Instancecontenttextdata_36311_Text: What curious creatures! They must have been emboldened by these terrible torrents.
Instancecontenttextdata_36312_Text: Mountain weather is wont to change on a whim, but 'tis not nature's whims at work here...
Instancecontenttextdata_36313_Text: Thank the kami the rains have ceased... We should make for shelter ere another storm passes through.
Instancecontenttextdata_36314_Text: Such tumultuous spirits! Servants of the wind, no doubt.
Instancecontenttextdata_36315_Text: These winds could blow a man away...and will, if we do not tread carefully!
Instancecontenttextdata_36316_Text: A thousand thousand paths...and yours ends here.
Instancecontenttextdata_36319_Text: We are everything and nothing─your first and final breath!
Instancecontenttextdata_36321_Text: Slayer of spirits... Their fate will soon be yours!
Instancecontenttextdata_36322_Text: Your soul is mine to claim! Your marrow, mine to burn...
Instancecontenttextdata_36323_Text: These treasures are mine! All mine! You shall not sully their brilliance!
Instancecontenttextdata_36324_Text: The head monk, I take it? And bearing a form befitting his proclivities...
Instancecontenttextdata_36327_Text: Beware the biwa's melody, ! It resounds with power...
Instancecontenttextdata_36330_Text: Beads to bind the spirit's form...With these words, be reborn!
Instancecontenttextdata_36333_Text: Hee hee! You thought you were free of me!
Instancecontenttextdata_36334_Text: Divine thunder, heed my call─bestow upon my biwa your tumultuous timbre!
Instancecontenttextdata_36335_Text: My power will see you humbled!
Instancecontenttextdata_36336_Text: A drink to fuel the fires of my fury!
Instancecontenttextdata_36337_Text: Ahahaha! You are as nothing before my might!
Instancecontenttextdata_36344_Text: It shall be mine...mine, I say! You cannot have it!
Instancecontenttextdata_36345_Text: The dance of a thousand petals begins with a single blossom!
Instancecontenttextdata_36346_Text: Wayward flowers, bend to my will!
Instancecontenttextdata_36350_Text: In summer's blaze do my blades sing... In winter's chill do they bite!
Instancecontenttextdata_36352_Text: Death blooms in a raging tempest!
Instancecontenttextdata_36353_Text: Come forth, dear friends, and beguile mine enemies!
Instancecontenttextdata_36354_Text: Solitary leaves, I call upon you─fly at the mercy of the storm!
Instancecontenttextdata_36355_Text: Reeds of the earth, take to the skies!
Instancecontenttextdata_36356_Text: From accursed boughs do wicked buds bloom!
Instancecontenttextdata_36358_Text: The blossoms must be enchanted. Keep a watchful eye on how they fly, !
Instancecontenttextdata_36359_Text: I should like to pat their fluffy little heads, but a well-trained pup will go to great lengths to protect its master...
Instancecontenttextdata_36360_Text: Face me, and I shall grant you an honorable death!
Instancecontenttextdata_36361_Text: My blade thirsts for mortal blood!
Instancecontenttextdata_36362_Text: To me, my warriors! Your lord has need of you!
Instancecontenttextdata_36364_Text: In tenebrous night shall you meet your end...
Instancecontenttextdata_36365_Text: In gardens of flame do true warriors thrive!
Instancecontenttextdata_36366_Text: War is a sea of sorrow, and you shall drown!
Instancecontenttextdata_36368_Text: My ire is an infernal flame, never to be smothered!
Instancecontenttextdata_36369_Text: Our spirits are as the wind, never to be fettered!
Instancecontenttextdata_36370_Text: To arms, my warriors! We make for the front lines!
Instancecontenttextdata_36371_Text: I once dreamed of shaking hands with a giant oni, but not like this!
Instancecontenttextdata_36372_Text: They may have strength in numbers, but worry not! If you cannot beat them, dodge them, I say!
Instancecontenttextdata_36373_Text: Thank the kami the winds have ceased... We should make for shelter ere we are blown back to the foot of the mountain!
Instancecontenttextdata_36374_Text: If I had to wager a guess, these must be the temple's stores. Rather spacious, aren't they?
Instancecontenttextdata_36375_Text: Were I a treasure─cursed or no─I imagine I would abide within these walls. But where...
Instancecontenttextdata_36376_Text: Under the auspices of two auspices, as it were. Curious.
Instancecontenttextdata_36377_Text: So the glass serves as a magicked doorknob of sorts? The monks were certainly inventive...
Instancecontenttextdata_36378_Text: You too are a connoisseur of Far Eastern maps, I trust? Terribly charming, how the Four Lords are shown ruling the cardinal directions.
Instancecontenttextdata_36380_Text: I might have known that Suzaku and Seiryu were the guardians of this gateway─though in fairness, one usually needs grapple with only one at a time.
Instancecontenttextdata_36381_Text: ...Would that we had arrived sooner. Judging by her supernatural size, the demons have already taken that poor shinobi.
Instancecontenttextdata_36382_Text: She must be in the thrall of a treasure. A promising lead...though at an unfortunate cost.
Instancecontenttextdata_36383_Text: I see no clockwork mechanisms... We've an honest-to-kami mononoke on our hands.
Instancecontenttextdata_36384_Text: The bloodlust is palpable... Have care, ! I shall be right here─at a reasonably safe distance─cheering you on!
Instancecontenttextdata_36386_Text: ...What, pray tell, is that look for?
Instancecontenttextdata_36390_Text: Well done, ! Even the fiercest mononoke is no match for you!
Instancecontenttextdata_36396_Text: Well done, ! You are an unholy terror on the battlefield─and I mean that in the most flattering way.
Instancecontenttextdata_36402_Text: A clash for the ages! Life-threatening circumstances aside, 'tis always a pleasure to witness bushido at work.
Instancecontenttextdata_36408_Text: How pleasingly picturesque! Had we no demons to slay, I would suggest a more leisurely stroll.
Instancecontenttextdata_36409_Text: I shudder to think of the chaos should those creatures find their way to civilization...
Instancecontenttextdata_36410_Text: I suppose we're obliged to take the scenic route.
Instancecontenttextdata_36411_Text: That ahead is Shojo Temple, home to Gorai and his accursed collection!
Instancecontenttextdata_36412_Text: If only we had time for the typical ablutions... But a proper pilgrimage must wait for another day.
Instancecontenttextdata_36413_Text: For now, treasure awaits! As do the monk and his minions, of course. Do have care.
Instancecontenttextdata_36414_Text: I admit that I was equally tempted to pull that rope, though part of me wishes you hadn't...
Instancecontenttextdata_36415_Text: The statues keep silent vigil in their masters' absence...but they are not the treasures we seek. Onward!
Instancecontenttextdata_36416_Text: The temple stretches on ever further. Step lively, ! We've plenty to explore.
Instancecontenttextdata_36417_Text: Even the inner sanctum is plagued with demons. If any who remained did survive, 'twould be nothing short of a miracle.
Instancecontenttextdata_36418_Text: Splendid as these statues are, they appear lacking in the “accursed” aspect. Our quarry must lie further in.
Instancecontenttextdata_36419_Text: Though the temple's isolation is a blessing for the smallfolk, I imagine it made the monks' experience all the more harrowing...
Instancecontenttextdata_36420_Text: We have yet to see hide nor hair of Gorai...
Instancecontenttextdata_36421_Text: Breathtaking! 'Tis as though the majestic tiger it depicts might pounce off the screen at any─ Oh?
Instancecontenttextdata_36422_Text: That was not an invitation! Your assistance, please, !
Instancecontenttextdata_36423_Text: That precarious pile of crates is a mountain unto itself!
Instancecontenttextdata_36424_Text: Somehow, I doubt that brute has learned its lesson... But let us continue on.
Instancecontenttextdata_36425_Text: By the kami, , how did you get up there?
Instancecontenttextdata_36426_Text: Adventurers and their climbing... Why, just the other day, on Kugane Tower─ But perhaps that is a tale for another time.
Instancecontenttextdata_36427_Text: That sounded promising... If you suddenly hear my winsome wailing, you had best come running!
Instancecontenttextdata_36428_Text: Ah, a secret stairwell! How very convenient.
Instancecontenttextdata_36429_Text: Both master and minion, irascible to the last...
Instancecontenttextdata_36435_Text: And so the demon is slain!
Instancecontenttextdata_36436_Text: Though his avarice availed him curious tools, your skill carried the day.
Instancecontenttextdata_36437_Text: One wonders what artifacts he might have unveiled had you waited a touch longer to deal the killing blow...but there's naught to be done about it now.
Instancecontenttextdata_36441_Text: Admirable as always, ! Few would be so keen to face down a rat of that size.
Instancecontenttextdata_36447_Text: Curious... This lantern shines differently than the rest. The mononoke's influence, perhaps?
Instancecontenttextdata_36448_Text: No, some other mechanism. What if I...
Instancecontenttextdata_36449_Text: Lesson learned, Hancock─do not prod eerily glowing objects!
Instancecontenttextdata_36450_Text: In any case, the monks went to great pains to conceal this path. What could have warranted such secrecy?
Instancecontenttextdata_36451_Text: Kami forfend! We could suffocate under this wicked haze...
Instancecontenttextdata_36452_Text: I'd wager the tsukumogami is the pipe itself─its body a mere illusion.
Instancecontenttextdata_36453_Text: A brilliant display! With the demonic smoke dispelled, we may breathe easy once more.
Instancecontenttextdata_36454_Text: Only an entity of great power could transform its surrounds so dramatically. You did well to outmaneuver it.
Instancecontenttextdata_36461_Text: Shrink before my might! Quiver in awe!
Instancecontenttextdata_36462_Text: A path straight up the holy mount, is it? How refreshingly dangerous!
Instancecontenttextdata_36464_Text: The Hingans call these clay figures “dogu”─but why is one here, of all places?
Instancecontenttextdata_36465_Text: Best to let sleeping dogu lie. For all we know, it could be cursed.
Instancecontenttextdata_36466_Text: If that dogu turns on us, its extermination shall be your responsibility, I hope you know!
Instancecontenttextdata_36467_Text: Fallen leaves and fresh greenery in such close proximity? 'Tis passing strange.
Instancecontenttextdata_36468_Text: There are few things more breathtaking than autumnal leaves...even if they are out of season. The influence of a treasure, I suspect.
Instancecontenttextdata_36469_Text: I understand you adventurers enjoy the roads less traveled, but─ And there she goes. Courage, Hancock!
Instancecontenttextdata_36470_Text: Such a tranquil place, these mountain heights. By the look of it, I presume it is not a path that many tread.
Instancecontenttextdata_36471_Text: Hmm... 'Tis not the first of those stones we've encountered. Do they serve as shrines of some sort?
Instancecontenttextdata_36472_Text: No shrine is built without purpose...or so I have heard. If such is the case, then what might this one be for?
Instancecontenttextdata_36474_Text: I, for one, have naught but respect for our new clay comrade! ...Do you think it can hear us?
Instancecontenttextdata_36475_Text: The warding talismans on this boulder give me pause...but it shall serve as well as any bridge, I suppose.
Instancecontenttextdata_36476_Text: One cannot go wrong with a rustic log bridge─assuming the trunk is free of angry spirits, of course...
Instancecontenttextdata_36477_Text: Gods be good! I know not how, but the statue has awakened...and it did not wake on the right side of the proverbial bed!
Instancecontenttextdata_36478_Text: Just a moment─I have read of this before! If I am not mistaken, that mononoke is Shishio, king among nue!
Instancecontenttextdata_36479_Text: Even a king of beasts is no match for you, I see! Well done, .
Instancecontenttextdata_36485_Text: A deed fit for legend! Quite literally, for Shishio appears in countless Hingan myths.
Instancecontenttextdata_36486_Text: One, in fact, tells of a wayfaring warrior who triumphed over it long ago.
Instancecontenttextdata_36491_Text: That is one mononoke felled─though if the legends are to be believed, Shishio is a wholly different beast than its tsukumogami brethren.
Instancecontenttextdata_36492_Text: It came to the mountain long before Gorai's time─was sealed here by the very founder of Shojo Temple, in fact.
Instancecontenttextdata_36497_Text: A harrowing display! Such ferocity have I rarely seen!
Instancecontenttextdata_36503_Text: The chorus of steel rings eternal!
Instancecontenttextdata_36504_Text: Mark where the armor readies its blade─though it has quite a reach, it cannot strike everywhere at once!
Instancecontenttextdata_36506_Text: A sorry attempt at an ambush, if you ask me...but let us continue on.
Npcyell_15703_Text: Were I to chart our course...
Npcyell_15705_Text: The portal, if you would, good sir.
Npcyell_15707_Text: Seal of shadow, reveal thy path!
Npcyell_15708_Text: Excellent! Let us be about it.
Npcyell_15711_Text: There is no end to these beasts!
Npcyell_15712_Text: 'Tis little wonder the mount was sealed.
Npcyell_15713_Text: No! My climbing attire is soaked...
Npcyell_15715_Text: Oh dear. They've raided the place!
Npcyell_15716_Text: Gods, they're everywhere! Have at them!
Npcyell_15718_Text: Oho! The wicked presence is no more.
Npcyell_15719_Text: All this for a dead end...? How odd.
Npcyell_15720_Text: You mean to take to the roof!?
Npcyell_15721_Text: I see the mononoke share your sensibilities!
Npcyell_15722_Text: Let us head back inside, quickly!
Npcyell_15723_Text: That battle must have blown out the lights.
Npcyell_15724_Text: Another flight of stairs! Shall we?
Npcyell_15726_Text: I shall leave the martial matters to you!
Npcyell_15727_Text: I spy a structure in the distance...
Npcyell_15728_Text: So many horrors, so little time!
Npcyell_15729_Text: Why, I feared that would be the end of me!
Npcyell_15730_Text: This temple is the pinnacle of picturesque.
Npcyell_15733_Text: Nooo! Spare me, I beg of you!
Npcyell_15735_Text: That way! Oh yes, that way!
Npcyell_15737_Text: How dare you! How dare you!
Npcyell_15739_Text: Would that we had a bit more light.
Npcyell_15740_Text: “Be careful what you wish for,” and all that...
Npcyell_15741_Text: I see naught else of note here.
Npcyell_15749_Text: No time to tarry! We've a ways to go.
Npcyell_15750_Text: I believe this is where you come in!
Npcyell_15751_Text: What lies at the end of the path, I wonder...?
Npcyell_15752_Text: There's a veritable menagerie on this mountain!
Npcyell_15753_Text: And just like that, the scenery is ruined!
Npcyell_15754_Text: You would think they'd have given up by now...
Npcyell_15755_Text: Hmm... Where to go from here?
Npcyell_15757_Text: Pray go on ahead...I need a moment.
Npcyell_15758_Text: ...This is precisely why a life of adventure is not for me.
Npcyell_15759_Text: 'Tis as though it's answering! How very polite.
Npcyell_15760_Text: The result of a landslide, perhaps?
Npcyell_15761_Text: A shinobi? And out in the open, at that...
Npcyell_15762_Text: What is that lodged in the statue?
